content: christmas mice santa s sleigh - by uljana semikrasa - skill level intermediate materials dmc petra cotton size 3 crochet hook 1 5mm crochet hook 1 75mm soft toy filling tapestry needle scissors thin wire/ pipe cleaners stitch marker abbreviations chain=chain st s =stitch es single_crochet=single_crochet slip_stitch=slip_stitch increase=increase 2 single_crochet in the same st 3sc=3 single_crochet in the same st decrease=invisible decrease insert hook in the front loops of the next 2 st s yarn over pull through first 2 loops yarn over pull through both loops sc3tog=single_crochet 3 stitches together insert hook in the front loops of the next 3 st s yarn over pull through the first 3 loops yarn over pull through both loops example single_crochet increase single_crochet 4 = single_crochet in the first stitch 2 single_crochet in the next stitch and single crochet in the last stitch 4 stitches in this round round notes use a 1 75mm hook for the sleigh not the runners use invisible decrease described in abbreviations for the rounds and a standard decrease insert hook in the 1st st yarn over pull through the first stitch insert hook in the 2nd st yarn over pull through the second st yarn over and pull through all 3 loops for the row most of the rounds are worked in continuous spiral but there are few rounds that start with a chain chain and end with a slip_stitch slip_stitch change the colour in the last loop of the st before the colour change stuff firmly as you work or as indicated christmas mice santa s sleigh pattern by uljana semikrasa treble_crochet
